meanings.definition: To be aware of the truth or fact of something
meanings.sent1: She knows the answer to the question.
meanings.sent2: He knows where the library is located.
meanings.sent3: The cat knows when it's time for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The detective knows all the secrets of the case.
meanings.sent5: The teacher knows how to explain difficult concepts clearly.

meanings.definition: To have knowledge or information about something
meanings.sent1: My friend knows a lot about history.
meanings.sent2: I know the recipe for chocolate chip cookies.
meanings.sent3: The computer knows all my passwords.
meanings.sent4: The scientist knows the inner workings of the human body.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide knows the best spots to visit in the city.

meanings.definition: To be acquainted or familiar with someone or something
meanings.sent1: She knows her way around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The dog knows the sound of its owner's car.
meanings.sent4: The actor knows the script by heart.
meanings.sent5: The gardener knows the names of all the plants in the garden.
